thread.title: Facebook puts its search tool on steroids

title: Facebook puts its search tool on steroids
text:
Facebook puts its search tool on steroids 
CNN Money Friday 23rd October, 2015 
The social network made it possible on Thursday for people to look across all public Facebook posts -- not just stuff from friends, groups, and pages that users follow....
